page.title: 16MULBERRY PLACE FARM,HORSHAM
page.content: The farm house is{500 years}old and has not been in the family for long. The owners of the farm house have lived there for 3 years.Before occupation as a farm house it was a {barn. The{10 acres}surrounding the farm house are for keeping{animals, therefore it is not an arable farm. They have many animals including 4 Highland Cattle ,1 bull, 6 chickens,4 Bantams,6 geese,7 ducks and 2 ponies. These animals are fed on hay,grain and grass. 4 calves are produced each and every year.They are auctioned and not sold privately.In the front of the garden there is an artificial pond which is for the geese and ducks.The geese and chickens are kept both for their eggs and for fun.At the back of the house is a natural pond.
